entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as a werewolf who is described as savage and having a mission to kill. He is also someone whom Lupin finds difficult to argue with.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a ruler who is liked by some werewolves because they think he will provide them with a better life.

relationships.description: Lupin finds it hard to argue with Greyback, suggesting that there is some kind of authority or influence relationship between the two.
Greyback likes Voldemort because he thinks he will provide him with a better life.
